name: QlikView Extension Properties Page File
summary: Learn about .QVPP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: QlikView extensions allow the integration of third-party visualization layouts.

description: Visual layout file used by QlikView, a business intelligence (BI) reporting application; contains HTML source code that specifies the layout of the properties page of an extension (.QAR file); used for formatting graphs and other BI data for a visualization.
